HERO.ROLE: Full-Stack Developer | C# and Angular Specialist
HERO.SUBTITLE: Building modern, fast and scalable web applications

about.title: About Me
about.introduction: I'm {{ name }}, a Full-Stack Developer experienced in building end-to-end web applications using Angular, .NET (C#) and SQL Server. I have contributed to and led features in real-world projects such as logistics platforms, access-control systems and real-time dashboards, working across both frontend and backend.
about.interests: I enjoy creating efficient and scalable solutions, improving processes and tackling technical challenges. I thrive in agile teams, collaborating with clients and delivering high-quality results. Learn more about my background on my LinkedIn.

tasks: Implementation and maintenance of Angular frontend and .NET/C# backend.
Design and optimization of SQL Server queries; data modeling.
Support and incident resolution in pre-production/production; technical documentation.
Integrations and collaboration with teams; Git/GitHub and agile workflows.
Development of components and forms with Angular (Reactive Forms) and responsive layout (HTML5 / SCSS).
Integration with REST APIs and relational DBs; schema design and queries (SQL Server / MariaDB).
Unit and e2e tests in Angular; incident resolution and deployments (IIS / Docker).
Use of Jira / Trello for task tracking and client communication.
Maintenance of the fresh products section.
Product replenishment and support to the store team.

wpf_db.title: WPF + Database
wpf_db.short: WPF app with DB and server â€” CRUD actions over objects.
description: Academic WPF project connected to a remote database.
Supported operations on objects (create, edit, delete) that updated the DB.
Deployed on a server with basic user control.

vue_php_shop.title: Online Shop (Vue + PHP)
vue_php_shop.short: Vue frontend with PHP backend and MariaDB. Booking / purchase flow (demo).
description: Vue.js app for a demo online shop.
Backend in PHP with MariaDB to manage products and reservations.
Purchase flows and simulated payment.

android_forms_firebase.title: Android + Forms + Firebase
android_forms_firebase.short: Android app with Firebase, JSON parsing and realtime interaction.
description: Android project with forms and Firebase as database.
Parsed JSON data from token-protected APIs.
Interactions stored in Firebase and synchronized.

logistics_erp.title: Logistics System (Angular + .NET)
logistics_erp.short: Custom ERP with sensors, real-time KPIs and bidirectional sync.
description: Integral system for logistics companies with Angular frontend and .NET backend.
Real-time KPIs, dynamic charts, maps and timelines.
Bidirectional synchronization and multi-tenant management.

quercus_camera.title: Access control with camera (Quercus)
quercus_camera.short: Camera image management, lists, permissions and access validation.
description: Ingest images from a Quercus camera to DB and show them on a web UI.
Statistics, profiles, permissions and sync with external systems like Biostar.
Barrier control, plate recognition logs and access history.

vehicle_registry.title: Daily vehicle registry
vehicle_registry.short: Web showing per-lane images and allowing to add plates to blacklist.
description: Daily registry with lane-by-lane images and easy browsing.
Blacklist feature to raise alarms when plates appear.
Filtering and report export.

image_card_service.title: Image <-> Card service
image_card_service.short: Service mapping camera images and card reads to build a whitelist.
description: Backend service that processes images and matches them with card readers.
Matches are promoted to whitelist entries.
Automated sync processes across devices.

sync_factorialapi.title: FactorialAPI â†’ Camera sync
sync_factorialapi.short: Sync users and plates from APIs to SAFIRE cameras.
description: Fetch users and plates from factorialapi and push them to camera APIs.
Compare with previous day to add/remove users or plates.
Validate and log changes.
